description:
SPECIAL OFFER: All students will receive a FREE 6-month digital subscription to Marie Claire UK Magazine, for a limited time only!

PLUS upon completion of the course, all students will receive a Marie Claire Beauty Genius certificate of completion.

Introducing Marie Claire Beauty Genius from Marie Claire magazine UK, a course of over 2 hours of expert make-up masterclasses and hair how-to videos, with world leading make-up artists teaching you how to get 59 amazing looks, from a classic smokey eye to screen siren lips.

As well as teaching you to recreate make-up looks straight from the catwalk or red carpet, the Marie Claire Beauty Genius has all the expert beauty know-how you need; from getting clever with bronzer, to melt proofing your make-up and mastering the art of contours. Marie Claire's bite-sized tutorials will ensure you look amazing every minute of your day.

ENROLL TODAY!
title: Makeup, Hair and Beauty Genius, by Marie Claire
